trends: There have been 2 other sightings in west point
There were no other sightings in west point on or around September 18th 2011
divs: Sighting Details The UFO appeared as i was video recording my family at the lake. They were over the water. And one was hovering about 6 inches off the ground approx 50 yards in front of my vehicle which i didn't see as i was recording. Only later did i see the UFO when i returned home did i notice something strange on the video.I could not see these objects with my naked eye only the camera was sensitive enough to capture them. I would like for some one to view this video and give me their opinion.
Summary: was captured on m 3G phone video. was not visible while i was video recording my family only notice later when i returned home that i noticed 3 Ufo's one on the ground one appeared in the clouds.
